designLanguage: The BetterUp design system emphasizes clarity and professionalism through clean typography, subtle depth, and focused interactions. The color palette balances trustworthy blues with energetic accents. Components maintain consistent spacing and interaction patterns to create a cohesive, premium experience.

components.name: Button
components.description: Buttons communicate actions users can take. They can be filled, outlined or text-only variants.

components.name: Card
components.description: Cards group related content and actions into a padded container with subtle depth.

components.name: Navigation
components.description: The main navigation provides consistent access to key sections and actions.
